summary: Building a Privacy Policy page for Stack Teacher (stackteacher.com) with updated branding, contact details, and styled cookies table.
architectural_notes: Privacy Policy page lives in the site footer alongside Terms of Use

existing_features.title: Create a new PrivacyPolicyPage component at frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx containing the full Privacy Policy content with all branding references using 'Stack Teacher' and 'stackteacher.com' (no 'Careerist' or 'careerist.com' references anywhere). All email references must use support@stackteacher.com and compliance@stackteacher.com. The physical address must be '30 N Gould St Ste N, Sheridan, WY 82801, USA'. The phone number must be '1234567890'. The page layout and typography should match the existing TermsOfUsePage.tsx style.

Within the PrivacyPolicyPage, replace any plain-text or prose cookie descriptions with a styled HTML table that lists cookie categories, cookie names, purpose, and duration/expiry. The table must use Tailwind CSS classes consistent with the site's design system (e.g., bordered cells, alternating row shading, responsive overflow-x-auto wrapper).
Register a new /privacy-policy route in frontend/src/App.tsx that renders the PrivacyPolicyPage component, following the same routing pattern used for the existing /terms route.
Add a 'Privacy Policy' link in the footer section of frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx that navigates to /privacy-policy, placed alongside or near the existing 'Terms of Use' link.

new_feature_requests.summary: Privacy Policy page with Stack Teacher branding, updated contact info (support@stackteacher.com, 30 N Gould St Ste N Sheridan WY, phone 1234567890), and styled cookies table
